key_changes: Added import statement for ToastProvider component
Wrapped entire Routes component tree with ToastProvider
Adjusted indentation throughout to accommodate new wrapper
file_insights.reason: ToastProvider is now root context for all routes, making toast notifications available application-wide

patterns_discovered.description: Using context providers at the root component level to provide functionality to all child routes
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures ToastProvider is initialized before any components that might trigger toast notifications

patterns_discovered.description: Component imports grouped logically, with new ToastProvider import placed after page imports
Indentation maintained throughout nested route structure after wrapping

gotchas_discovered.description: Wrapping Routes with ToastProvider causes large indentation change affecting all nested routes, making diff appear larger than functional change
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: This is unavoidable when wrapping existing structures; consider using git diff --ignore-all-space for cleaner review

gotchas_discovered.description: ToastProvider must be properly initialized before any child components render, or toast functionality will be unavailable
gotchas_discovered.verification_needed: Ensure ToastProvider implementation properly initializes context

approach_outcome.description: Successfully integrated ToastProvider as root context provider in App component
approach_outcome.integration_points: ToastProvider wraps all Routes, making toast notifications available to entire application

recommendations.recommendation: Verify ToastProvider initialization and test toast notifications across different routes
Document that ToastProvider is now the root context and update component documentation if toast usage is expected
Review ToastProvider component implementation to ensure proper context setup and cleanup
Consider adopting a consistent pattern for provider composition if additional context providers are needed (consider using composition pattern or separate AppProvider wrapper)
